articles.title: US heatwave: A third of Americans under extreme heat advisories - BBC
articles.description: Emergency room doctors are treating dehydrated construction workers and others with heat exhaustion.
articles.content:
A blistering US heatwave is forecast to intensify this weekend, with warnings issued across the south-west. 
Heat advisories late on Friday affected at least 113 million Americans, from Florida to T… [+3799 chars]

articles.title: Jung Kook Withstands the Rain to Save ‘Good Morning America’ Performance - Rolling Stone
articles.description: His setlist featured the new single “Seven,” which features the rapper Latto, and two BTS songs, including “Euphoria” and “Dynamite”
articles.content: The rain couldn’t stop Jung Kook from celebrating the release of his solo single “Seven” on Friday morning. The BTS member took the stage in Central Park in the early hours of the morning to perform … [+1414 chars]
